headline: Electric Toothbrush Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2029, Featuring Colgate, Philips, Procter & Gamble, Brush Buddies, Caresmith, Den Mat, Brush Baby, and More
summary: The electric toothbrush market is set to expand by USD 1.89 billion from 2024-2029, with an 8% CAGR. Growth is fueled by rising oral health awareness and innovative products. The report offers comprehensive analysis on market size, trends, vendors, and forecasts. Segments include distribution channel, mobility type, end-user, product type, and regional landscape. headline: Procter & Gamble (PG) Plans Restructuring as Citi Maintains Buy Rating
summary: The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) ranks among the top consumer staples stocks according to hedge funds. Filippo Falorni, a Citi analyst, maintained a Buy rating on The Procter & Gamble Company (NYSE:PG) with a price target of $181 on June 6. P&G’s financial forecast and strategic ambitions form the basis of Filippo Falorni’s assessment. […]
